synopsis: In this heartfelt episode of Pineapple Plant Rotation, hosts Devam and Ahir dive deep into the emotional complexities of breakups, sharing personal experiences and insights on healing and self-discovery. Through candid conversations, they encourage listeners to embrace their feelings and seek support, highlighting the importance of perspective during tough times.
quotes: To love means to let go.
The moment I tried to distract myself from my feelings, that's when I stopped making progress.
It's okay to talk about your issues, even if you're going through a tough time.
Healing means being able to feel whole by yourself.
You can always find someone who's worse off than you, but that doesn't make your problems any less legitimate.
I need to plan less and live moment to moment.
The hardest part is being happy with yourself when your happiest moments were shared with someone else.
Every experience is a chance to learn and grow.
It's empowering to realize that my story is unwritten.
Sometimes you just need to remind yourself that this too shall pass.
